parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Chosen by the Parliament of Queensland on 21.5.2015 under section 15 of the Constitution to represent that State in the Senate, vice Hon. B Mason (resigned).

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Senate Legislative and General Purpose Standing: Community Affairs: Legislation and References Committees from 15.6.15.
Joint Standing: National Disability Insurance Scheme from 15.6.15.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Vice-Chair, LNP Jimboomba/ Woodhill; Vice-Chair, LNP Logan SEC; Secretary and Treasurer, LNP Logan SEC, 2009-12.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
